participant_b.entity_text: signal transducer and activator of transcription 4

verbose_text: Given that signal transducer and activator of transcription 4 (STAT4) is induced and activated by IL-12 and IL-6, we evaluated its possible role in mDC mediated priming of Tfh like cells.
evidence: signal transducer and activator of transcription 4 (STAT4) is induced and activated by IL-12 and IL-6
